title: letter_to_gao_06_26_2008
abstract:
June 26, 2008
Timothy P. Bowling
Chief Quality Officer
United States Government Accountability Office
Washington, DC 20548
 
Subj: Unsolicited Joint Venture Proposal   
Dear Mr. Bowling:
Thank you very much for your letter of June 2, 2008 and the 10 DVDs you enclosed.  I 
realize this is only an early prototype and is nothing like the material that Thomson 
West has, but I think you’ll agree that even this subset will be very useful to those that 
work with legislative histories, and it certainl
